import React from 'react'; import '../styles/BookingsTable.css'; function BookingsTable({ bookings, statusOptions = [], onDelete, onStatusChange, loading }) { if (loading) { return
‚è≥ Loading bookings...
; } if (!bookings || bookings.length === 0) { return (

üìÖ Bookings

No bookings found for this period

); } const totalRevenue = bookings.reduce((sum, b) => sum + (b.revenue || 0), 0); const totalNights = bookings.reduce((sum, b) => sum + (b.nights || 0), 0); return (

üìÖ All Bookings

Total Bookings: {bookings.length}
Total Revenue: ${totalRevenue.toFixed(2)}
Total Nights: {totalNights}
{bookings.map((booking) => ( ))}
Date Guest Name Area Revenue Paid Balance Add-ons Status Return? Actions
{new Date(booking.booking_date).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' })}
{booking.guest_name}
{booking.guest_type} 		{booking.area_rented} ${booking.revenue?.toFixed(2) || '0.00'} ${(booking.amount_paid || 0).toFixed(2)} ${(booking.balance_due || 0).toFixed(2)} {booking.add_ons?.length || 0} {booking.is_return_booking ? ( üîÑ Yes ) : ( ‚ú® New )}

üí° Tip: Update payment balances in the Payments tab and convert waitlist guests as slots open.

); } export default BookingsTable;
